title: Earthub
brief: I worked on a feature for an internal design tool that supports the creation and management of Earthub's website. The tool was designed to streamline the workflow for designers and developers, ensuring consistency across the platform.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented a new feature for the internal design tool.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and feedback.
Conducted user testing and iterated on the design based on feedback.
outcome: The feature was successfully integrated into the design tool, resulting in a 20% increase in workflow efficiency for the design team.

title: Simulated Elevator System
brief: Built a Java-based elevator simulation with a team, featuring robust system design, UML documentation, and a polished presentation to showcase key engineering decisions.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented the core elevator simulation logic.
Collaborated with team members to create UML diagrams and documentation.
Presented the project to faculty and peers, highlighting key design decisions.
outcome: The project was well-received, earning top marks for its robust design and thorough documentation.
